doc:
Richard Ryder (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Ryder_(actor) 0 Richard Ryder (20 August 1942 – 27 October 1995) was an American actor from Rochester, New York. Ryder starred in the motion pictures Abuse and Forever Young, as well as the television movies Threesome, Laker Girls, Cries Unheard: The Donna Yaklich Story and When the Dark Man Calls. He also played a Bajoran deputy in the Star Trek: Deep Space Nine episodes "Past Prologue" and "Babel" and also guest starred in Dream On, Designing Women and Party of Five. Ryder died in Hollywood, California in 1995, of AIDS, aged 53. Richard_Ryder ( 20_August_1942 – 27_October_1995 ) was an_American_actor from Rochester , New_York . Ryder starred in the_motion_pictures_Abuse and Forever Young , as_well_as the_television_movies_Threesome , Laker_Girls , Cries_Unheard : The_Donna_Yaklich_Story and When the_Dark_Man_Calls . He also played a_Bajoran_deputy in the_Star_Trek : Deep_Space_Nine_episodes " Past_Prologue_"_and_"_Babel " and also guest starred in Dream On , Designing_Women and Party of Five . Ryder died in Hollywood , California in 1995 , of AIDS , aged_53 .
